item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-09-14
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Starbucks - LAS Airport (McCarren Airport, Las Vegas). #
  • I'm at Venetian Las Vegas (3355 Las Vegas Blvd South, Spring Mountain, Las Vegas). #
  • Why is Vegas the only place in the world I bounce out of bed early? Must be all the loud noises & blinking lights. #
  • Taylor Swift you had your chance to hit Kanye in the back of the head with the moonman statue. If there's a next time go ahead & do it. #
  • I'm at Caesars Palace Forum Shops (3100 Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas). #
  • I'm at Bellagio (3600 Las Vegas Blvd S, W Flamingo Rd, Las Vegas). #

Powered by Twitter Tools
